About Edukidz

Preschool or a nursery is your child's first experience away from you. EduKidz will be your child's fun partner and we guide your child to make the move from home to school a smooth one.

Academic Classes Our Facilities Art & Games Food & Beverage

About our multimedia classes

Our solid academic lessons assist in laying the groundwork for your child's future career. Begin with the fundamentals and work your way up to more advanced courses. The following courses should help your child succeed in college and beyond.

Spanish Classes

About our academic facilities

Our school building responds to evolving educational programs by providing a physical setting that is comfortable, safe, secure, accessible, well-lit, well-ventilated, and visually beautiful. Our grounds, buildings, and facilities are all in excellent condition.

About our music and arts

Art and games encourage youngsters to examine creativity more deeply, think about it, and discuss it. They provide a framework for faculties to build on children's observations, understandings, and discussions about creativity.

About our daily meals

Wherever feasible, we promote healthy eating and drinking options. Smart nutritional decisions made during the school day can help children develop lifetime healthy eating habits and reach their full potential.

Breakfast
  • Fruits
  • Cheese Sandwich (Gluten Free Option Available)
  • Fresh Orange Juice
  • Crackers
  • Fruit Salad
